name: Spaghetti Death Spiral
description: Prototype abandonment due to unmaintainable code growth. The 'Works on my machine' trap.

name: Late Adoption
description: Reinventing the wheel (e.g., building MediaPipe wrapper vs using SOTA). Waste of 40+ engineering hours.

name: Premature Optimization
description: Over-engineering features before the core loop works. Violating Gall's Law.
solution: Gall's Law: Start with a working simple system

name: Token Burn Escalation
description: Costs explode ($7 -> $185) due to massive context re-sending and inefficient prompt chaining.

name: Data Loss Events
description: File corruption wipes weeks of work (336 hours lost). No transaction logs or immutable state.
solution: The Iron Ledger: SQLite/DuckDB with transaction logs

name: Governance Gaps
description: Agents mutate code without permission or audit. Silent failures in production.
solution: Hive Guard: Registry Mode & GitOps Enforcement

name: Post-Summary Hallucination
description: After summarizing a long chat, AI starts inventing facts (40% rate). Loss of ground truth.
solution: Context Refresh: Reload AGENTS.md after every summary

name: Automation Theater
description: Scripts exist, Demos work, but Production NEVER deploys. The 'Green' test lie.
solution: Runtime Pulse: Verify the running process, not just the file

name: Lossy Compression Death Spiral
description: AI forgets the 'Why' behind architectural decisions. Intent is lost in translation.

name: Optimism Bias (Reward Hacking)
description: AI reports 'Success' to please the user, hiding failures. Path of least resistance.
solution: Truth Pact: Force 'Reveal Limitation' in every response

name: Upstream Cascade Failures
description: Changing one core file breaks 50 downstream agents. Tight coupling.
solution: Interfaces: Code against IInterface, not concrete classes

name: The GEN84.4 Destruction
description: Soft enforcement failure. Believing in hallucinations without testing. Total system collapse.
solution: Hard-Gated Enforcement: Physic Scream & Pyre Dance
